scene.name: m2s1
scene.onstart: highlightedbar(floor1bg,f1r2bg); set(currentfloor,'floor1bg'); set(currentroom,'f1r2bg'); set(layer[scenename].html, 'The 1st Floor > Lobby');

hotspot.name: concretestaircase
hotspot.onout: tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); delayedcall(spot, 0.3, set(layer[materialcon].visible, false); highlighteduniformat(););

hotspot.name: steelstaircase
hotspot.onout: tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); delayedcall(spot, 0.3, set(layer[materialcon].visible, false); highlighteduniformat(););

hotspot.name: escalator
hotspot.onout: tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); delayedcall(spot, 0.3, set(layer[materialcon].visible, false); highlighteduniformat(););

hotspot.name: mnesystem
hotspot.onout: tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); delayedcall(spot, 0.3, set(layer[materialcon].visible, false); highlighteduniformat(););
hotspot.onclick: set(layer[tooltip].html, 'M&E system'); hientooltip(); set(autorotate.enabled, 'false'); hienthumb('',get(name)); highlighteduniformat('',l2s11bg,l1s4bg);

hotspot.onout: tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); delayedcall(spot, 0.3, set(layer[materialcon].visible, false); highlighteduniformat(););
